author: James Crenshaw
comment: Nice app love it wish it had more art more options for the font for the small time and also 12 hour option too. Some of the pictures you can't even see the clock.
title: Love the art wish it had more and 12 hour

author: Colby Powers
comment: Please add more high quality backgrounds, and the ability to change to 12 hour time. Arigato gozaiimasu!
title: Update please

author: Juan Rodriguez
comment: I wish I could add a custom wallpaper (in the paid version).   I loved the app, please keep it updated! :)

author: Ippiki Ookami
comment: Probably i can't use it or set it up wrong, am using cperia Z Ultra with SW2. Is it compatible? Just can't seem to change my watchface. N ots a paid app. If it was free, i wouldn't have bothered. Help??

reply.author: Meron Apps
reply.content: We apologise, but this watch face is not compatible for SW2. It's designed for Android Wear. Thank you.

title: Neutral

author: Tim Albertson

reply.author: Meron Apps
reply.content: We have released a new version (2.0) in order to support round watches. Thank you!

title: Glad it finally got round watch support

author: Dmitry Zaytsev
comment: Would be great to: 1. be able to change text color - sometimes it's not really readable; 2. Disable seconds - it's nice but I don't need them, and they are making overall watch face less calm and stable. Despite those requests - awesome watch face!
title: Nice!

author: Marc Legowski
comment: Doesn't work on Sony Z2 Experia and/or Sony smart watch 2.

reply.author: Meron Apps
reply.content: This watchface is for Android Wear devices not for SW2.

title: Rubbish!

reply.author: Meron Apps
reply.content: Please write us an e-mail with more details about what's your problem and we will help you. Thank you

author: robert hodgson
comment: this is a great app and works really well.  I found a little bug and the developers were quick to respond and even faster in resolving the issue.  would recommend to anyone.
title: great app, excellent response from developers

author: Aeron Bess
comment: I love the wallpapers! However, could settings be added to change the size of the roman and kanji characters? Thanks!
title: Looks stunning
